name: Copter Strike VR
summary: A fun, high-flying VR experience where players engage in intense multiplayer battles as helicopter pilots. With realistic controls and a variety of game modes, players can maneuver their choppers to take out enemies with a combination of turret and rocket fire. The cartoony environment provides a visually stunning backdrop for intense dogfights, with the added danger of crashing or hitting obstacles. Test your aerial combat skills and see if you have what it takes to become the top sky warrior!
